title: Arabic 49
text: The true lover yearneth for tribulation even as doth the rebel for forgiveness and the sinful for mercy.

prev.title: Arabic 48
prev.text: For everything there is a sign. The sign of love is fortitude under My decree and patience under My trials.
prev.teaser: For everything there is a sign...

next.title: Arabic 50
next.text: If adversity befall thee not in My path, how canst thou walk in the ways of them that are content with My pleasure? If trials afflict thee not in thy longing to meet Me, how wilt thou attain the light in thy love for My beauty?
